title: Near major public transit and buslines! Great for commuters!
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'A wonderful home in Bloomington is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 1 bedroom 1 bathroom renting for $1710 - $1730 per month.', 'This unit comes with 886 sq ft.', 'Amazing.', 'Great staff.', 'The best.', 'A great place to call home.', 'The Covington is in a great location near popular attractions and with easy access to I-494, Hwy 5 & public transportation.', "We're just 13 miles south of Minneapolis and 22 miles southwest of St. Paul.", "Take a ten-minute stroll and you'll be at the Normandale Lake Bandshell, which holds fun outdoor concerts and events.", "If you're more into cultural activities, check out the nearby Bloomington Center for the Arts where you'll find theaters, art galleries, art classrooms and more.", 'Like the water?', 'Bush Lake Beach is the perfect spot for canoeing, swimming, exploring trails or just laying out on the sand.', "If you're looking for a pet-friendly community with a variety of nearby activities, then check out Covington Apartment Homes today.", 'We have several different open floor plans that are sure to fit your lifestyle needs.', 'Contact Weidner Apartment Homes to check availability and learn about our leasing options.', 'Our amazing staff is excited to help you and your family become the newest residents of Bloomington, MN!', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '− Bike Storage', '− Business Center', '− Courtyard', '− Elevator', '− Free Weights', '− Guest Apartment', '− Movie Theater', '− Online Payments',
